# gx-audio

A component to load an audio.

## Usage Sample

```HTML
<gx-audio src="https://www.w3schools.com/tags/horse.mp3"></gx-audio>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `accessibleName` | `accessible-name` | Specifies a short string, typically 1 to 3 words, that authors associate with an element to provide users of assistive technologies with a label for the element. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`        | This attribute lets you specify if the element is disabled.                                                                                                       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `src`            | `src`             | This attribute is for specifies the src of the audio.                                                                                                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
